DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if there are significant differences in the side effects related to memory, repetition and recall among these three drugs when used in a pediatric population.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Side Effects of Commonly Prescribed Medications in Pediatric Migraine
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of migraine with and without aura or chronic daily headache as defined by IHS subjects must between the age of 817 (inclusive) diagnosis of tensiontype headache or cluster headache
